statements: DELETE FROM pharmacogenomic_data WHERE patient_id = 100 AND medication_name = 'Aspirin';
DELETE FROM pharmacogenomic_data WHERE response_type = 'Positive' AND dosage > 50.00;
DELETE FROM Medications WHERE dosage > 100 AND patient_id = 5;
DELETE FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Female' AND age < 30;
DELETE FROM medications WHERE dosage > 50.0 AND administration_time = '10:00:00';
DELETE FROM Treatments WHERE patient_id IN (SELECT patient_id FROM Patients WHERE age > 50);
DELETE FROM GenomicData WHERE patient_id = (SELECT patient_id FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Female');
